Instance.description: Interaction that allows a player to pick a known object.
Instance.parents: ObjectPickerInteraction, PickerSingleChoiceSuperInteraction, PickerSuperInteraction, ImmediateSuperInteraction, SuperInteraction, Interaction

TunableVariant.name: additional_tests
TunableVariant.description: Additional tests to further trim Objects selected to show up in the picker.

TdescFragTag.name: enabled
TdescFragTag.description: A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet. ORs of ANDs

TunableEnum.name: knowledge_tag
TunableEnum.description: The tag for the knowledge type eg. secret_passageways.

TunableEnum.name: knowledge_type
TunableEnum.description: The type of knowledge to filter objects by. KNOWN - Only known objects will be shown. UNKNOWN - Only unknown objects will be shown. ALL - All objects will be shown.

Tunable.name: out_of_zone_icon
Tunable.description: The icon to be displayed to the right of object outside of the current zone.

TunableEnum.name: participant_to_save_on_selection
TunableEnum.description: The participant that will be saved as the saved_participant specified.

TunableEnum.name: saved_participant_slot
TunableEnum.description: The saved participant slot that participant will be saved as.

TunableVariant.name: variant
TunableVariant.description: Location from where the objects will be shown.

TunableTuple.name: anywhere
TunableTuple.description: Variant that returns all the items..

TunableTuple.name: in_zone
TunableTuple.description: Variant that returns only items inside the current zone.

TunableTuple.name: out_of_zone
TunableTuple.description: Variant that returns only items outside the current zone.
